tool.name: Plot dimension reduction
tool.description: Graphs the output of a dimensional reduction technique (PCA by default). Cells are colored by their identity class.
tool.command: seurat-dim-plot.R --input-object-file '$input' #if $reduction_use --reduction-use '$reduction_use' #end if #if $dim_1 --dim-1 $dim_1 #end if #if $dim_2 --dim-2 $dim_2 #end if #if $cells_use --cells-use $cells_use #end if #if $pt_size --pt-size $pt_size #end if #if $label_size --label-size $label_size #end if #if $group_by --group-by $group_by #end if #if $plot_title --plot-title '$plot_title' #end if --png-width $png_width --png-height $png_height --output-image-file $output_image_file

param.name: input
param.label: RDS object
param.help: File in which a serialized R matrix object may be found

param.name: reduction_use
param.label: Dimensionality reduction
param.help: Which dimensionality reduction to use. Default is "pca", can also be "tsne", or "ica", assuming these are precomputed

param.name: cells_use
param.label: Cells list
param.help: File to be used to derive a vector of cells to plot (default is all cells)

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
Seurat_ is a toolkit for quality control, analysis, and exploration of single cell RNA sequencing data. It is developed and maintained by the `Satija Lab`_ at NYGC. Seurat aims to enable users to identify and interpret sources of heterogeneity from single cell transcriptomic measurements, and to integrate diverse types of single cell data.
This tool graphs the output of a dimensional reduction technique (PCA by default). Cells are colored by their identity class.
-----
**Inputs**
* Seurat RDS object
-----
**Outputs**
* PNG-format image file
.. _Seurat: https://www.nature.com/articles/nbt.4096 .. _Satija Lab: https://satijalab.org/seurat/
